00000000000000000000000001111011
start decimal
q = 123

00000000000000000000000001011011
q = (n >> 1) + (n >> 2)
q = 91

00000000000000000000000001100000
q = q + (q >> 4)
q = 96

00000000000000000000000001100000
ALARM q = q + (q >> 8)
q = 96

00000000000000000000000001100000
q = q + (q >> 16)
q = 96

00000000000000000000000000001100
q = q >> 3
q = 12

00000000000000000000000000000011
r = n - (((q << 2) + q) << 1)
r = 3

00000000000000000000000000001100
q = q + (r > 9)

q = 12
